# Import library and data

We are going to work with 'lung' dataset from survival
```{r imports}
library(AutostatR)
library(survival)

head(lung)

```

```{r table1}
variables <- c("age", "sex","wt.loss")

table1(lung,
       variables)
```

```{r with_y}


table1(lung,
       variables,
       y="status")

```
